plays.text: Goal scored by Anson Carter assisted by Mike York and Todd Marchant
Goal scored by Jani Rita assisted by Dan Cleary and Marty Reasoner
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Eric Brewer
Penalty to Scott Ferguson 2 minutes for Hooking Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Diving Scott Ferguson
Penalty to Alexei Semenov 2 minutes for Hooking Sergei Fedorov
Goal scored by Igor Larionov assisted by Brett Hull and Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Ales Pisa 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Todd Marchant 2 minutes for Crosschecking Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Ethan Moreau 2 minutes for Slashing Nicklas Lidstrom
Goal scored by Brett Hull assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Dmitri Bykov 2 minutes for Slashing Ethan Moreau
Goal scored by Kris Draper assisted by Kirk Maltby
Goal scored by Anson Carter assisted by Mike York and Eric Brewer
Penalty to Jason Woolley 2 minutes for Holding Mike York served by Martin Gelinas
Goal scored by Eric Brewer assisted by Jason Chimera and Brian Swanson
